bibl.title: The Ethics and Economics of Ptolemaic Religious Associations. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Paper presented at the Inaugural Sather Conference, "Papyrology: New Approaches in a New Generation", at the University of California - Berkeley. - Suggests that religious associations institutionalized informal ethical norms into formal rules that lowered the costs of transacting and facilitated cooperation among villagers.
MONSON Andrew, The Ethics and Economics of Ptolemaic Religious Associations. Avec résumé en anglais.
